item.title: MoreProcessorsNotAlwaysBetter
item.description: Original Author/link This activity was originally proposed by Mary Smith and Srishti Srivastava. Paper (Srivastava2019) and slides available on-line. Details See paper for details. In summary, the goal is to write the statement “More Processors Are Not Always The Best”, along with the indices of each letter. Sequential phase. In the sequential phase, a single student is instructed to first write the statement show above (task 1) and then write the index associated with each letter (0 .
